course_title: Adult Gerontology Acute Care NP Practicum I
course_description: This course provides a clinical practice preceptorship with faculty oversight to develop skills in health assessment and physical exam, differential diagnosis, diagnostic reasoning, and planning care for individual episodic and chronic conditions.
prerequisites: NRSG 701D and NRSG 704D and NRSG 706D as prerequisites, NRSG 767D as co-requisite, or equivalent transfer credit.
sections: Class Nbr: 1583, Section #: 1, Type: CLN, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: M. McFarland, Status: Open
